ValidationRule.description: Social Care: restriction from posting misspelled words
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(IsOutbound=TRUE, OR( CONTAINS(Content,"irresistable"), CONTAINS(Content,"knowlege"), CONTAINS(Content,"liase"), CONTAINS(Content,"liason"), CONTAINS(Content,"lollypop"), CONTAINS(Content,"millenium"), CONTAINS(Content,"millenia"), CONTAINS(Content,"Neandertal"), CONTAINS(Content,"neccessary"), CONTAINS(Content,"noticable"), CONTAINS(Content,"ocassion"), CONTAINS(Content,"occassion"), CONTAINS(Content,"occured"), CONTAINS(Content,"occuring"), CONTAINS(Content,"occurance"), CONTAINS(Content,"occurence"), CONTAINS(Content,"pavillion"), CONTAINS(Content,"persistant"), CONTAINS(Content,"pharoah"), CONTAINS(Content,"peice"), CONTAINS(Content,"politican"), CONTAINS(Content,"Portugese"), CONTAINS(Content,"posession"), CONTAINS(Content,"prefered"), CONTAINS(Content,"prefering"), CONTAINS(Content,"propoganda"), CONTAINS(Content,"publically"), CONTAINS(Content,"realy"), CONTAINS(Content,"recieve"), CONTAINS(Content,"refered"), CONTAINS(Content,"refering"), CONTAINS(Content,"religous"), CONTAINS(Content,"rember"), CONTAINS(Content,"remeber"), CONTAINS(Content,"resistence"), CONTAINS(Content,"sence"), CONTAINS(Content,"seperate"), CONTAINS(Content,"seige"), CONTAINS(Content,"succesful"), CONTAINS(Content,"supercede"), CONTAINS(Content,"suprise"), CONTAINS(Content,"tatoo"), CONTAINS(Content,"tendancy"), CONTAINS(Content,"therefor"), CONTAINS(Content,"threshhold"), CONTAINS(Content,"tommorow"), CONTAINS(Content,"tommorrow"), CONTAINS(Content,"tounge"), CONTAINS(Content,"truely"), CONTAINS(Content,"unforseen"), CONTAINS(Content,"unfortunatly"), CONTAINS(Content,"untill"), CONTAINS(Content,"wierd"), CONTAINS(Content,"whereever")))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: It appears as if you have misspelled a word. Please review, adjust and resend your post
